description: Unique identifier for the Import Compensation Survey Jobs request

Compensation_Survey_Job_Detail_HV.description: If a survey job doesn't have a matched job profile, entering Yes copies job matches from the most recent compensation survey into this one. If a survey job already has a matched job profile, Workday doesn't overwrite the match. If you enter No or leave this field blank, Workday doesn't copy job matches.

Compensation_Survey_Job_DetailObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Compensation_Survey_Job_DetailObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Compensation_Survey_Job_DetailObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Compensation_Survey_Job_Detail_HV.description: Reference ID for the survey job with job title and possibly level, function, or family.

Compensation_Survey_Job_Data.description: Reference ID for the survey job with job title and possibly level, function, or family.

Compensation_SurveyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Compensation_SurveyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Compensation_SurveyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Compensation_Survey_Job_Data.description: The instance of compensation survey that the survey job will be linked to.
Job code of a job in a compensation survey.
Job title of a job in a compensation survey.
Job level of a job in a compensation survey.
Job description of a job in a compensation survey.
Functional area of a job in a compensation survey.
Job family of a job in the compensation survey, usually referring to the group of jobs with similar title but different levels.

Compensation_Survey_Job_Sub-DetailObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Compensation_Survey_Job_Sub-Detail_Data.description: Reference of further details of a survey job, such as specialty.
Specialized area of a survey job.

validation.validation: Duplicate specialty [specialty] under job [job_title] of job code [job_code]. Please remove duplicates.

Compensation_Survey_Job_Detail_HV.description: Reference of the survey job with job title and possibly level, function, or family.

description: Request element for high-volume Import Compensation Survey Jobs web service
